name: Incredible Egg Macaroni Salad
author: Anna Bollinger

ingredients.name: (17 1/4 oz.) pkg. Macaroni and Cheese dinner

instructions: Prepare macaroni and cheese dinner as directed on the package. Add peas, tomatoes, salad dressing, celery, onion and seasonings. Chop 5 eggs, add to dinner mixture. Mix lightly. Chill. Stir in additional salad dressing before serving, if desired. Garnish with remaining egg, sliced
